contributorsList.thisWeek:
**Functional Purpose**: Label for a time period filter button
**UI Location**: Contributing → Contributors List (time period filter)
**When Users See This**: When viewing the list of contributors, as an option to filter by activity in the current week
**Technical Context**: Displays 'This week'.
**Current English**: "This week"
contributorsList.last30Days:
**Functional Purpose**: Label for a time period filter button
**UI Location**: Contributing → Contributors List (time period filter)
**When Users See This**: When viewing the list of contributors, as an option to filter by activity in the last 30 days
**Technical Context**: Displays 'Last 30 days'.
**Current English**: "Last 30 days"
contributorsList.lastYear:
**Functional Purpose**: Label for a time period filter button
**UI Location**: Contributing → Contributors List (time period filter)
**When Users See This**: When viewing the list of contributors, as an option to filter by activity in the last year
**Technical Context**: Displays 'Last year'.
**Current English**: "Last year"
contributorsList.allTime:
**Functional Purpose**: Label for a time period filter button
**UI Location**: Contributing → Contributors List (time period filter)
**When Users See This**: When viewing the list of contributors, as an option to filter by activity across all time
**Technical Context**: Displays 'All time'.
**Current English**: "All time"
